column5: Here's a Chritmas postcard that has the ARA's PO'd  It's Justin Trudeau and family decked out in coyote fur.
Different times but his dad gave people the finger too.
I see nothing wrong with that.
His daddy wore fur all the time.
dagnabit its gettin cold out here !!!!!!!!!!
Good for him ,stick it to P3TA.

I don't know if it's just me, but that photo looks Photoshopped.  I like the fur though.  Although, there seems to be too much of it for a picture.   They look like they were swallowed by some animal and are poking out of it.
I'd like a pocket holster for my S&W 642 that's made entirely from Ingrid Newkirk's hide.

I was pleased when I read this a few days ago..  “I think one of the ways of calculating whether you're doing things right or not is looking at who's opposing you and P3TA has lost much of any credibility it had in Canada,” Trudeau said.  Full article here...  http://cnews.canoe.ca/CNEWS/Politics/2010/12/16/16580826.html   G.
